description: Wish you had your iPad or tablet during those mundane daily moments—riding the morning commuter bus or standing in line at the store? This attaché fulfills that wish and provides protection for your tablet when you are on-the-go.  Thoughtfully designed so you never have to remove the shoulder strap to instantly remove your tablet or to put it away when its your turn to check-out.
title: Case Logic QTA-110 9 to 10.2-Inch Semi-Rigid Kindle Fire HD/iPAD/2/New iPAD 3rd Generation Tablet Attache' (Black)
